channel.title: How do i make an item so you cant equip it
channel.description:
ok i want to make it where my players can't equip items like, all pickaxes, and all hatchets
revision : 317 loading 602/634 source: trsidiaxV2 request: How to make certain items un wield able.

item.title: How do i make an item so you cant equip it
item.dc:creator: @alexis1 alexis1
item.description:
@alexis1 wrote:

Or just remove bank from donors, unless you want to pretty much remove all skills.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make an item so you cant equip it
item.dc:creator: @hotkid8200 hotkid8200
item.description:
@hotkid8200 wrote:

[quote=“Virgin, post:5, topic:461746”][quote author=hotkid8200 link=topic=564695.msg4110147#msg4110147 date=1348436737]
well there is a problem where donators can use ::bank, and just leave an auto clicker on bank all so they get unlimited amounts of runite ore, magic logs, to sell to the shop, and get 200m xp by being afk.
[/quote]LOLOLOLOL LMFAO.
Newbies, okay. Listen, make your “Bank” code to where it opens the back interface and not just banks your items.
and Question: What the hell does this have to do with the title…?[/quote]

Facepalm, when someone banks, there action doesn’t stop. the title is like that because if the item isn’t equitable then when they bank all, it stores all… meaning that it stores the rune pickaxe as well…

Read full topic
